Method Detail

AddTag

public ReturnInfo AddTag(com.hci.geotagger.Objects.Tag t)
This method will add a Tag to the database. The input Tag object contains the necessary fields to be added to the database.

Parameters:
t - this is the Tag object to add to the database
Returns:
Returns a ReturnInfo object which identifies the success of the Add operation

Internal method to add a Tag to the server. This method makes the specific JSON calls to add the record to the database.

getTagsById

public ArrayList<com.hci.geotagger.Objects.Tag> getTagsById(int oId)
Return all of the Tags associated with a specific Owner ID. The Tag objects returned are contained in the returned ArrayList.

Parameters:
oId - The Owner ID to use for the request.
Returns:
The ArrayList containing the associated Tags is returned

createTagFromJSON

public static com.hci.geotagger.Objects.Tag createTagFromJSON(JSONObject json)
Static function to create a Tag object from a JSON Object. All JSON functions are meant to be contained within the connectors are of the project.

Parameters:
json - The JSONObject to convert to a Tag object
Returns:
a Tag object is returned

getTagsByIdFromServer

private JSONArray getTagsByIdFromServer(int oId)
Private method to query the server for the Tags associated Owner ID. This method returns a JSONArray (array of JSON Objects) containing all the tags for the given user ID

Parameters:
oId - The Owner ID to use for the query
Returns:
A JSONArray with the results of the query

deleteTag

public ReturnInfo deleteTag(long tagId)
This method will delete a tag from the database

Parameters:
tagId - ID of the tag to remove
Returns:
ReturnInfo object returned which identifies operation success

addTagComment

public ReturnInfo addTagComment(Long tagID,
                                String text,
                                String username)
Add a Tag Comment to the database. A ReturnInfo object is returned with result information and the Comment object.

Parameters:
tagID - ID of the Tag to add the comment to
text - Text of the comment to add
username - User name of the person adding the comment
Returns:
a ReturnInfo object with operation status and the new Comment object

addTagComment

public ReturnInfo addTagComment(Long tagID,
                                String text,
                                String username,
                                String imgURL)
Add a Tag Comment to the database with a picture. A ReturnInfo object is returned with result information and the Comment object.

Parameters:
tagID - ID of the Tag to add the comment to
text - Text of the comment to add
username - User name of the person adding the comment
imgURL - URL of the image to be added to the comment
Returns:
a ReturnInfo object with operation status and the new Comment object

This method generates a Comment object from the input JSON object.

Returns:
Comment object is returned

getTagComments

public ArrayList<com.hci.geotagger.Objects.Comment> getTagComments(long tagID)
This method returns an ArrayList of Comment objects, that are associated with the input tagID value.

Parameters:
tagID - the Tag ID to use to retrieve the Comment records
Returns:
The ArrayList containing the Comment objects

getTagCommentsFromServer

private JSONArray getTagCommentsFromServer(long tagID)
This method will retrieve all comments related to a specific tag from the server. The returned value is a JSONArray of Comment records.

Parameters:
tagID - The Tag ID used to retrieve the Comments
Returns:
The JSONArray object that contains the retrieved Comments

deleteTagComment

public ReturnInfo deleteTagComment(long commentId)
This method will delete a Tag Comment from the database

Parameters:
commentId - The ID of the Comment record to delete
Returns:
A ReturnInfo object is returned to identify how the operation proceeded.
